msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.title: Numbers 4
ab.l:
And
the Lord spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,

‘Take the
sum of the heads of sons of Kohath from among the sons of Levi,
by their families, by the house of their fathers:

From thirty years old
and upward and up to fifty years old, all who come to the army,
to do the work in the tent of meeting.

This is the service of the sons
of Kohath in the tent of meeting: the Holy of Holies.

And
Aaron and his sons shall come when the camp is to set out, and they shall take down
the veil of the covering and cover with it the ark
of the law.

And they shall put on it a cover
of porpoise skin, and shall spread over it a cloth all of blue,
and shall put its poles over the shoulders
of those who carry it.

And on the table of
showbread they shall spread a cloth of blue, and they shall put on it
the bowls, and the spoons, and
the cloth |used for covering the showbread|, and the tablecloths, the cover;
and the continual bread shall be on it.

And they shall spread on them a cloth of scarlet
silk, and they shall cover it with a covering of porpoise skin,
and they shall set its poles.

And they shall take
a blue cloth and cover the lampstand of the light,
and its places for candles, and its tongs,
and its censers, and all the vessels to keep the oil |in them|
with which they serve to it.

And
they shall put it and all its equipment into a covering of porpoise
skin, and they shall put it on a beam.

And on the golden altar they shall spread a blue cloth, and
they shall cover it with a covering of porpoise skin, and they shall set
its poles.

And they shall take all the
vessels of the service with which they serve in the Holy
and put them in a blue cloth and cover them with a covering
of porpoise skin and put them on a beam.

And they shall take away the ashes of the
altar and spread a cloth of purple over it.

And they shall put on it all its equipment
with which they serve at it —
the censers, and the forks, and the
brushes, and the cups — all the equipment
of the altar, and they shall spread on it a covering of porpoise
skin and set its poles.

And
when Aaron and his sons will finish covering the
Holy and all the equipment of the Holy when the camp sets out,
after that the sons of Kohath shall come
to carry. But they shall not touch the Holy: they will die.
These are what the sons of Kohath are to carry in the tent of meeting.

And the supervision of Eleazar, son of Aaron, the
priest, is the oil for the light, and the fragrant incense,
and the continual grain offering, and the anointing oil — the supervision
of all the tabernacle, and of all that is in it, in the Holy, and in its vessels.’

And the Lord spoke to Moses and
to Aaron, saying,

‘Beware not to cut off
the tribe of the families of the Kohathites from among the Levites,

But do to them thus, that they may live, and
not die when they approach to the Holy of Holies: Aaron and
his sons shall go in and appoint them every one to his service
and to his burden.

But they shall not go in to see
the Holy when it is being covered: they will die.’ A second translation of
‘But they shall not go in to see’: But they shall not go in to see
the Holy when it is being covered: they will die.’
Parashat Naso

And the Lord spoke to Moses,
saying,

‘Take the sum
of the heads of the sons of Gershon, them as well, by the houses of their fathers,
by their families.

From thirty years old and upward and up to fifty
years old you shall number them, all who come to join up to do military service,
to do service in the tent of meeting.

This is the service
of the families of the Gershonites: to serve, and to carry burdens.

And they shall carry the curtains of the tabernacle, and
the tent of meeting, its covering, and the covering of porpoise skin
that is on it above, and the cover for the door
of the tent of meeting,

And the curtains of the court, and
the cover for the door of the gate of the court, which is by the tabernacle
and by the altar all around, and their cords,
and all the equipment of their service, and all that is made
for them, and they shall serve.

According to the command
of Aaron and his sons shall be all the service of the sons
of the Gershonites, in all their burdens, and in all their service.
And you shall appoint to them the charge of all their burdens.

This is the service of the families of the sons of the Gershonites
in the tent of meeting. And their charge is in the hand of Ithamar
the son of Aaron the priest.

The sons of Merari:
you shall number them by their families, by the house of their fathers.

From thirty
years old and upward and up to fifty years old you shall number them, all who
comes to the army, to serve the service of the tent of meeting.

And this is the charge of their burdens, according to all their service
in the tent of meeting: the boards of the tabernacle, and its bars, and
its pillars, and its bases,

And the pillars
all around the court, and their bases, and their pegs, and their cords,
by all their equipment, and by all their service. And
you shall entrust the equipment of the charge of their burdens by name.

This is
the service of the families of the sons of Merari, by all their service
in the tent of meeting in the hand of Ithamar, son of Aaron,
the priest.’

And Moses and Aaron and
the princes of the congregation numbered the sons of the Kohathites by their families,
and by the house of their fathers,

From thirty years old and upward
and up to fifty years old, all who come to the army,
for the service in the tent of meeting.

And those numbered
of them by their families were two thousand seven hundred and fifty.

These were those numbered of the families of the Kohathites, all those
who do service in the tent of meeting, whom Moses and Aaron did number
according to the commandment of the Lord by the prophecy of Moses.

And those numbered of the sons of Gershon,
by their families, and by the house of their fathers,

And those numbered
of them, by their families, by the house of their fathers, were two thousand and
six hundred and thirty.

These are those numbered of the families
of the sons of Gershon, of all that serve in the tent
of meeting, whom Moses and Aaron did number according to the commandment
of the Lord.

And those numbered of the families of the sons
of Merari, by their families, by the house of their fathers,

And those numbered
of them by their families were three thousand and two hundred.

These are those numbered of the families of the sons of Merari, whom
Moses and Aaron numbered according to the command of the Lord by the prophecy of Moses.

All those numbered, whom Moses and Aaron and the princes of Israel numbered, the Levites,
by their families, and by the house of their fathers,

From thirty years old and upward and up to fifty years old, all who comes to serve
the service of service and the service of carrying the burden
in the tent of meeting:

And those numbered of them
were eight thousand and five hundred and eighty.

According to the command
of the Lord he numbered them by the prophecy of Moses, every man
by his service and by his burden: and his counts |were|, as
the Lord commanded Moses.
